chunk:
DIME Nourishing Cleansing Oil

Brand: DIME

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Diisostearate, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isododecane, Isohexadecane, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene,
ated Polyisobutene, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sambucus nigra Fruit (Elderberry) Extract, Santalum Spicatum (Sandalwood) Oil, Tocopherol
